lines.text:
[Both are laughing]
Why, I... I don't know whether to laugh or cry.
[She laughs again and so does he]
Well, why - why not do a little of both? You know the old gag. That's all there is to life. A little laughter... a little tear.
Well, I - I was just gonna say it's wonderful the way your grandmother can make those birds talk.
Hector, she could make Coolidge talk.

[Referring to one of the rubies]
If that little rascal had swallowed it, we would have never recovered it.
Oh, I would have recovered it all right.

[to the jeweler]
She means an emetic.

[They both laugh]
What a sense of humor!

[to the sideshow crowd]
Well, friends, that's all there is to life - just a little laugh... a little tear.
